
=head1 NAME

contributor

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 id (serial) - 
 person_id (integer) - 
 role_type (character varying) - 
 organization (character varying) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

                                           Table "gcis_metadata.contributor"
     Column    |       Type        |                        Modifiers                         | Storage  | Description 
 --------------+-------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+----------+-------------
  id           | integer           | not null default nextval('contributor_id_seq'::regclass) | plain    | 
  person_id    | integer           |                                                          | plain    | 
  role_type    | character varying | not null                                                 | extended | 
  organization | character varying |                                                          | extended | 
 Indexes:
     "contributor_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (id)
 Foreign-key constraints:
     "contributor_ibfk_1" FOREIGN KEY (person_id) REFERENCES person(id) MATCH FULL
     "contributor_ibfk_3" FOREIGN KEY (role_type) REFERENCES contributor_role_type(identifier) MATCH FULL
     "contributor_organization_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (organization) REFERENCES organization(identifier)
 Referenced by:
     TABLE "publication_contributor" CONSTRAINT "publication_contributor_ibfk_2" FOREIGN KEY (contributor_id) REFERENCES contributor(id) MATCH FULL
     TABLE "submitter" CONSTRAINT "submitter_contributor_id_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (contributor_id) REFERENCES contributor(id)
 Triggers:
     audit_trigger_row AFTER INSERT OR DELETE OR UPDATE ON contributor FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE audit.if_modified_func('true')
     audit_trigger_stm AFTER TRUNCATE ON contributor FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE PROCEDURE audit.if_modified_func('true')
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
